title: Twitch Bot Diagnostics Follow-up
description: Monitor Agent-1's progress on Phase 1 Connection Diagnostics for the Twitch bot. Review their diagnostic results and coordinate next steps for Phase 2 (Connection Fix).
deliverables: Decision on next steps for Phase 2
handoff_notes: Agent-1 is currently working on verifying OAuth token, checking Twitch chat, enhanced logging, and manual IRC tests. Follow-up message sent with validation findings (configuration structure issues, OAuth token format). Expect a report soon.

title: Theme Asset Coordination Follow-up
description: Review Agent-2's progress on identifying the theme asset owner and creating a coordination plan for website deployment assets. Coordinate with Agent-7 for deployment readiness.
deliverables: Confirmation of asset owner and delivery plan
handoff_notes: Agent-2 was assigned to identify the theme asset owner and document requirements. Follow up on their report.

title: Phase 2 SSOT Verification Preparation Monitoring
description: Monitor Agent-8's progress on Phase 2 SSOT verification infrastructure preparation. Review SSOT verification checklist and verification plan when available. Coordinate with Phase 2 consolidation planning.
handoff_notes: Agent-8 was assigned Phase 2 SSOT verification preparation task (HIGH priority, 1-2 hours estimated). Task includes scope review, checklist creation, verification plan, and domain identification. Monitor progress.

title: GitHub Rate Limit Monitoring & PR Undraft
description: Monitor GitHub CLI rate limit reset. Once reset, coordinate with Agent-1 for manual undrafting of DreamBank PR #1 and continuation of GitHub consolidation.
deliverables: Coordination with Agent-1 for PR undraft
handoff_notes: GitHub CLI rate limits were exhausted. Agent-1 is monitoring. Manual PR undraft is a quick task once limits reset.

title: Swarm Capacity Optimization
description: Continue monitoring swarm capacity and identifying delegation opportunities. Review agent availability and assign additional tasks to maintain optimal swarm utilization (~60% capacity available).
handoff_notes: Swarm capacity analysis completed showing ~60% capacity available. Agent-8 assigned Phase 2 SSOT preparation. Monitor other agents (Agent-3, Agent-5, Agent-6, Agent-7) for additional capacity.

title: Coordination Status Monitoring
description: Continue monitoring active coordinations (Twitch bot, theme assets, Phase 2 SSOT, GitHub consolidation). Update coordination status as progress is made. Identify blockers and coordinate resolutions.
handoff_notes: Coordination status validation completed showing all coordinations active and progressing. 100% message delivery, 100% task assignment, coordination health: 100%. Continue monitoring.
